TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MachineKeySection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class MachineKeySection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定義組態設定，其在 Windows Form 驗證、檢視狀態驗證及工作階段狀態應用程式隔離中，控制加密、解密和訊息驗證碼 (MAC) 作業使用的金鑰產生和演算法。

span.span: Defines the configuration settings that control the key generation and algorithms that are used in encryption, decryption, and message authentication code (MAC) operations in Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改的內容`MachineKey`組態檔中的區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `MachineKey` section in the configuration file. `MachineKey`區段可以在電腦 (Machine.config) 或應用程式 (Web.config) 層級設定和控制的金鑰和演算法，可進行 Windows 表單驗證、 檢視狀態驗證，而且工作階段狀態的應用程式隔離。The `MachineKey` section can be configured at the machine (Machine.config) or application (Web.config) level and controls the keys and algorithms that are used for Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation. 這些功能運作的 Web 伺服器 （Web 伺服陣列），網路上的任何`DecryptionKey`並`ValidationKey`屬性的`MachineKey`區段都必須設有明確交易，並完全有效的索引鍵值。For any of these features to work across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), the `DecryptionKey` and `ValidationKey` attributes of the `MachineKey` section must be configured explicitly and identically with valid key values. `AutoGenerate`值不適用於 Web 伺服陣列，因為它依賴的密碼編譯隨機密碼，其會保存使用電腦本機保護，不會相同跨多部電腦。The `AutoGenerate` value does not work for Web farms, because it relies on a cryptographically random secret, which is persisted using machine-local protection and will not be the same across more than one computer. ## Examples 在本節中的範例示範如何指定宣告為區段中，也可以為成員存取的多個屬性的值類別。The example in this section demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 組態檔中的下列範例示範如何以宣告方式為 [] 區段中指定的值。The following example from a configuration file shows how to specify values declaratively for the section. ``` ``` 下列範例示範如何使用在程式碼中的類別。The following example demonstrates how to use the class in code. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果您將此組態中的索引鍵指定為需要在 Web 伺服陣列案例，建議您在使用受保護的組態加密這一節。
If you to specify keys in this configuration section, as is required in Web-farm scenarios, it is recommended that you encrypt this section by using protected configuration.

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須設定這個屬性，如果您將設定屬性。This property must be set if you set the property. 屬性值會傳遞至factory 方法。The property value is passed to the factory method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode CompatibilityMode { System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定是否使用在 .NET Framework 2.0 Service Pack 1 版後所引入的檢視狀態升級加密方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether upgraded encryption methods for view state that were introduced after the .NET Framework version 2.0 Service Pack 1 release are used.

value.span: 值，表示是否使用在 .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 版後所引入的加密方法。

span.span: A value that indicates whether encryption methods that were introduced after the .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 release are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 升級的加密方法，在新版的.NET framework 中降低風險，攻擊者可以成功地完成反向工程`DecryptionKey`值。The upgraded encryption methods in later versions of the .NET Framework reduce the risk that an attacker can successfully reverse-engineer the `DecryptionKey` value. 為了維持回溯相容性提供的較舊的加密方法。The older encryption methods are available in order to maintain backward compatibility. Web 伺服陣列中的所有伺服器都應該都具有屬性設定為相同的值。All servers in a Web farm should have the property set to the same value. 如果在讀取表單驗證票證的伺服器具有不同設定與伺服器建立票證，票證無法辨識。If the server that reads a forms authentication ticket has a different setting than the server that created the ticket, the ticket won't be recognized. 可以指定下列值屬性：The following values can be specified for the property: - `Framework20SP1`。`Framework20SP1`. 這個值會指定 ASP.NET 使用 2.0 SP2 比舊的版本中可用的加密方法。This value specifies that ASP.NET uses encryption methods that were available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than 2.0 SP2. 如果任何伺服器有.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 以前的版本，請在 web 伺服陣列中的所有伺服器使用此值。Use this value for all servers in a web farm if any server has a version of the .NET Framework earlier than 2.0 SP2. 這是預設值，除非應用程式的 Web.config 檔案具有`targetFramework`屬性的`httpRuntime`元素設定為"4.5"。This is the default value unless the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5". - `Framework20SP2`。`Framework20SP2`. 這個值會指定 ASP.NET 使用所導入.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 升級的加密方法。This value specifies that ASP.NET uses upgraded encryption methods that were introduced in the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2. 如果所有伺服器都具有.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 或更新版本，但至少一個都沒有.NET Framework 4.5，請在 web 伺服陣列中的所有伺服器使用此值。Use this value for all servers in a web farm if all servers have the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2 or later but at least one does not have the .NET Framework 4.5. - `Framework45`。`Framework45`. 針對 ASP.NET 4.5 的密碼編譯增強功能才會生效。Cryptographic enhancements for ASP.NET 4.5 are in effect. 這是預設值，如果應用程式的 Web.config 檔是否`targetFramework`屬性的`httpRuntime`元素設定為"4.5"。This is the default value if the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5". 當這個屬性設定為`Framework45`，實際上是下列限制：When this property is set to `Framework45`, the following restrictions are in effect: - 如果 屬性有值， 屬性也必須有值。If the property has a value, the property must also have a value. 類別要求，提供非空白的應用程式名稱。The class mandates that a non-empty application name be provided. - 屬性必須是實際的驗證演算法 （例如 MD5、 SHA1、 HMACSHA256、 HMACSHA384、 HMACSHA512） 或自訂演算法子類別化型別。The attribute must be an actual validation algorithm (for example, MD5, SHA1, HMACSHA256, HMACSHA384, HMACSHA512) or a custom algorithm that subclasses the type. 值 AES 和 3DES 是禁止。The values AES and 3DES are forbidden. - 此架構不會產生只有簽署的承載。The framework will not produce signed-only payloads. 表單驗證票證一定會是同時加密及簽署，不論`protection`屬性的`forms`元素會設定 Web.config 檔案中。Forms authentication tickets will always be both encrypted and signed, regardless of how the `protection` attribute of the `forms` element is set in the Web.config file. 檢視狀態會永遠同時加密並簽署如果`EnableViewStateMac`或`RequireViewStateEncryption`設為指定的頁面。View state will always be both encrypted and signed if either `EnableViewStateMac` or `RequireViewStateEncryption` is set for a given page. 結果中所述的安全性更新[Microsoft 資訊安全佈告欄 MS10 070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070)，預設的加密行為也適用於`Framework20SP1`和`Framework20SP2`設定。As a result of the security update that is described in [Microsoft security bulletin MS10-070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070), the default encryption behavior is the same for the `Framework20SP1` and `Framework20SP2` settings. 預設行為不建議變更，但如果您想要這麼做，請參閱[如何在 ASP.NET 中設定舊版的加密模式](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938)。Changing the default behavior is not recommended, but if you want to do that, see [How to configure legacy encryption mode in ASP.NET](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938).

summary.span: 取得或設定資料保護裝置類型的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data protector type.
The default is .

value.span: 資料保護裝置類型的名稱。

span.span: The name of the data protector type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定自訂的資料保護演算法適用於 ASP.NET，設定屬性，以並將這個屬性設定為字串，表示衍生自的類別類別。To specify custom data protection algorithms for ASP.NET, set the property to and set this property to a string that represents a class that derives from the class. 此字串會對應到`providerClass`參數傳遞給靜態factory 方法。This string corresponds to the `providerClass` parameter that is passed to the static factory method. 您指定類別由並方法，即使您未指定選項。The class you specify is used by the and methods even if you do not specify the option. 如果您設定這個屬性時，您也必須設定屬性。If you set this property, you must also set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Decryption { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Decryption : string with get, set

summary.span: 指定用於加密和解密表單驗證資料的加密演算法。

span.span: Specifies the encryption algorithm that is used for encrypting and decrypting forms authentication data.

value.span: 表示演算法的值，這個演算法用於加密和解密表單驗證資料。

span.span: A value that indicates the algorithm that is used to encrypt and decrypt forms authentication data.

value.span: (如需如何指定加密檢視狀態時所使用之演算法的相關資訊，請參閱 屬性)。 是預設值。

span.span: (For information about how to specify the algorithm that is used when view state is encrypted, see the property.) is the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援下列的解密值：The property supports the following decryption values: - `Auto`這是預設值，指定 ASP.NET 決定要使用的加密演算法根據設定的預設設定。`Auto`, which is the default value, specifies that ASP.NET determines which encryption algorithm to use based on configuration default settings. - `AES`指定 ASP.NET 使用演算法來加密資料。`AES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the algorithm to encrypt data. `AES` 是預設的演算法來加密資料。`AES` is the default algorithm to encrypt data. - `3DES`指定 ASP.NET 使用演算法來加密資料。`3DES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the algorithm to encrypt data. - 自訂的演算法。A custom algorithm. 這個屬性通常設定以宣告方式在`decryption`Web.config 檔案項目的屬性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 項目。For more information, see the element.

exception.span: 選取的值不是其中一個解密值。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the decryption values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DecryptionKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DecryptionKey : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來加密和解密資料的金鑰，或是產生金鑰的處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets the key that is used to encrypt and decrypt data, or the process by which the key is generated.

value.span: 金鑰值，或是表示如何產生金鑰的值。

span.span: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來加密和解密，例如 Windows 表單驗證，以及檢視狀態時屬性設定為"3DES"或"AES"。The property is used for encryption and decryption, such as in Windows Forms authentication, and for view state when the property is set to "3DES" or "AES". 您可以使用"AutoGenerate 」 選項來指定 ASP.NET 產生的隨機金鑰，並將它儲存在本機安全性授權。Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority. "AutoGenerate 」 選項是預設值的一部分。The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value. 如果您加入 「 IsolateApps"修飾詞來 「 自動產生 「值，ASP.NET 產生唯一的加密的金鑰，每個應用程式使用每個應用程式。If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 這是預設設定。This is the default setting. 如果您加入 「 IsolateByAppId"修飾詞來 「 自動產生 「值，ASP.NET 產生唯一的加密的金鑰，每個應用程式使用每個應用程式。If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 如果兩個不同的應用程式共用的虛擬路徑 (或許是因為不同的連接埠上執行這些應用程式)，這個旗標可用於進一步區分它們與另一個。If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another. 只能由 ASP.NET 4.5 中，了解 「 IsolateByAppId 」 旗標，但是它可以用不論設定。The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the setting. 如果您需要支援的網頁伺服器 （Web 伺服陣列） 網路上的設定，設定屬性，以手動方式，以確保一致的組態。If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the property manually to ensure consistent configuration. 如需如何以手動方式產生值`DecryptionKey`屬性，請參閱[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中的設定 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113). 這個屬性通常設定以宣告方式在`DecryptionKey`Web.config 檔案項目的屬性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `DecryptionKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 項目。For more information, see the element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指定用於驗證表單驗證和檢視狀態資料的雜湊演算法。

span.span: Specifies the hashing algorithm that is used for validating forms authentication and view state data.

value.span: 表示雜湊演算法的值，這個演算法用於驗證表單驗證和檢視狀態資料。

span.span: A value that indicates the hashing algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性支援加密演算法所定義的列舉型別。The property supports encryption algorithms that are defined by the enumeration. 這個屬性通常設定以宣告方式在`decryption`Web.config 檔案項目的屬性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 項目。For more information, see the element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationAlgorithm : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定演算法的名稱，這個演算法用於驗證表單驗證和檢視狀態資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.

value.span: 字串，其中包含預先定義的演算法名稱或自訂演算法的名稱。

span.span: A string that contains the name of a predefined algorithm or the name of a custom algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所定義的預先定義的演算法所提供列舉型別。The predefined algorithms that are available are defined by the enumeration. 如果您想要使用自訂的演算法，您沒有設定這個屬性。If you want to use a custom algorithm, you do not have to set this property. 設定屬性，以自訂演算法的名稱。Set the property to the name of the custom algorithm. 當您這麼做時，這個屬性會自動設定為。When you do that, this property will automatically be set to . 您可以設定Web.config 檔案中以宣告方式或以程式設計方式在程式碼中的屬性。You can set the property declaratively in the Web.config file or programmatically in code. 若要以宣告方式設定這個屬性，您使用`validationAlgorithm`組態檔中項目的屬性。To set this property declaratively, you use the `validationAlgorithm` attribute of the element in the configuration file. 這個屬性可以設定的預先定義的演算法或自訂演算法的名稱。This attribute can be set to the name of a predefined algorithm or of a custom algorithm. 所定義的預先定義的演算法列舉型別。The predefined algorithms are defined by the enumeration. 中指定的自訂演算法`validationAlgorithm`屬性使用"alg: 」 後面的演算法名稱的前置詞。Custom algorithms are specified in the `validationAlgorithm` attribute by using the "alg:" prefix followed by the name of the algorithm. 如果您使用此格式來指定自訂的演算法屬性設定為和此屬性設定為後面的名稱"alg:"前置詞。If you use this format to specify a custom algorithm, the property is set to and this property is set to the name that follows the "alg:" prefix. 若要以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，使用其中一個預先定義的演算法所定義的值列舉型別，或將此屬性設定為自訂的演算法名稱。To set this property programmatically, use the value of one of the predefined algorithms that are defined by the enumeration, or set this property to a custom algorithm name. 如果您的自訂演算法的名稱設定此屬性，設定屬性設。If you set this property to the name of a custom algorithm, set the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationKey : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來驗證表單驗證和檢視狀態資料的金鑰，或是產生金鑰的處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets the key that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data, or the process by which the key is generated.

value.span: 金鑰值，或是表示如何產生金鑰的值。

span.span: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性使用時`enableViewStateMAC`是`true`建立訊息驗證碼 (MAC)，以啟用 ASP.NET 以判斷是否檢視狀態已遭竄改。The property is used when `enableViewStateMAC` is `true` to create a message authentication code (MAC) to enable ASP.NET to determine whether view state has been tampered with. 屬性也會用來產生跨處理序，以確保該工作階段狀態變數的應用程式特定的工作階段識別碼會隔離應用程式之間。The property is also used to generate out-of-process, application-specific session IDs to ensure that session state variables are isolated between applications. 您可以使用"AutoGenerate 」 選項來指定 ASP.NET 產生的隨機金鑰，並將它儲存在本機安全性授權。Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority. "AutoGenerate 」 選項是預設值的一部分。The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value. 如果您加入 「 IsolateApps"修飾詞來 「 自動產生 「值，ASP.NET 產生唯一的加密的金鑰，每個應用程式使用每個應用程式。If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 這是預設設定。This is the default setting. 如果您加入 「 IsolateByAppId"修飾詞來 「 自動產生 「值，ASP.NET 產生唯一的加密的金鑰，每個應用程式使用每個應用程式。If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 如果兩個不同的應用程式共用的虛擬路徑 (或許是因為不同的連接埠上執行這些應用程式)，這個旗標可用於進一步區分它們與另一個。If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another. 只能由 ASP.NET 4.5 中，了解 「 IsolateByAppId 」 旗標，但是它可以用不論設定。The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the setting. 如果您需要支援的網頁伺服器 （Web 伺服陣列） 網路上的設定，設定屬性，以手動方式，以確保一致的組態。If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the property manually to ensure consistent configuration. 如需如何以手動方式產生值`DecryptionKey`屬性，請參閱[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中的設定 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113). 這個屬性通常設定以宣告方式在`validationKey`Web.config 檔案項目的屬性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `validationKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property by using code. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#2)]
